name: Hype o'clock Presents: Teacart 1k: The Musical: Obsessive Collector's Complete Edition 20-in-1 Cart
name_original: Hype o'clock Presents: Teacart 1k: The Musical: Obsessive Collector's Complete Edition 20-in-1 Cart
description:
Vanquish monsters and shoot some hoops!

Take a breather and prune your bonsai tree!

Live the life of a seagull and poop on cars — in 3-D!

Play a romantic super villain rectitude simulator!

Do all this and more in the complete collection of Teacart 1k submissions.

— About —

In February 2015, Hype o'clock Game Dev & Tea Time hosted Teacart 1k, a 48-hour worldwide game jam centered around the use of Sharecart1000. This huge monolithic bundle includes all 20 games submitted to the jam.

Sharecart1000 games share a single save file. Playing one game may affect what happens in another. Each of these games interprets the save file in its own way.

(In this package, the save file is located at SHARECART100/dat/o_o.ini)

While you can play these games through the included game loader, you can also put them inside your existing Sharecart library.

Note: These games were made by a wide variety of developers using different tools — expect some inconsistency! If a game fails to load, try using the [ Reset Cart ] option from the loader menu.

— Credits —

  • The games: Various authors (see details inside loader)
  • Bundle curation, game loader program: @_alts and @hryx
  • Post-jam developer feedback: @Triplefox
